Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th  buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Michigan, 119th, Westworth, and 115th due to street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 115th, Michigan, 119th, Wentworth, and 115th due to street blockage near 115th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following  earlier police activity at Pulaski. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following  earlier police activity at Pulaski.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
